---
title: "Anonymizing using PKI"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
require(PKI)

key <- PKI.genRSAkey(2048)         # generate the key
x <- charToRaw("Hello, world!")    # original word to hexa
e <- PKI.encrypt(x, key)           # encrypt
y <- PKI.decrypt(e, key)           # decrypt

stopifnot(identical(x, y))

print(rawToChar(y))                # hexa to character
```


```{r}
charToRaw("Hello, world!")
```


```{r}
print(rawToChar(y))
```
